Articles.Content:
(because of non-existant forum skillz, no image here; see below)

Credits goes to: Guybrush (For helping me trying to make some sense of C#)

and N3X15 for giving us the basics.

CUSTOMIZEABLE POS/NAV LIGHTS

Comes with four models: White, Green, Red and Blue navigation light.

Can be found under 'Decals'.

Activates by default with the 'L' key (can be changed in each cfg)

Toggles between five modes: Defaults are: On (Cannot be changed), 1 second interval, 5 second interval, Epilepsy mode and Off (Modes 1-3 can be edited in each cfg).

Colour for each model can be changed (also in the cfg), the higher the number, the brighter the light. (Default 1)

NEXT/FINAL VERSION:

The reason this isn\'t ver 1.0 is simply because we have not figured out a way to make lens flares or particles. In the next version they will be included, also customizeable with size, colour and intensity.

New stage icon (Possibly change between lit and unlit)

Flare/Particles

More models

NOTES:

Activates on Part Start, so put the navlights in the first stage (The parts are color coded)

Sometimes, you have to press the key a few times for it to change mode.

The source code is available in the rar, feel free to use it as you wish, as long as you give credits.

Also, feel free to post any comments, bug reports, etc.
